name: DBI 2020 #4(concept car)
description: DBI 2020 is concept car of how the car will be in the future. The idea is that a car consists of separate elements: a capsule - a car body and two electric motorcycles that are joined with the body forming a single whole. Electric motorcycles are the driving force of this car, they have artificial intelligence and can move independently. The electric motorcycle can also be operated as a separate mode of transport. The concept car can move not only on city roads, but also on the road. Authors: Ilzat Karimov Batyrkhan Bayaliev
